snippet: Rickie Fowler has taken a serious approach to the major championships this year, putting the focus on the scorecard rather than his formerly vivid style of dress.
abstract: Rickie Fowler is taking a serious approach to major tournaments this season, putting focus on his golf rather his formerly flashy wardrobe; is two shots behind leader Rory McIllroy after third round of PGA Championship.
lead_paragraph: Rickie Fowler has taken a serious approach to the major championships this year, putting the focus on the scorecard rather than his formerly vivid style of dress.

headline.seo: P.G.A. Championship 2014: Rickie Fowler Shoots 67 in Third Round
headline.main: Toning Down His Wardrobe and Letting His Play Do the Talking
headline.print_headline: Fowler Tones Down Wardrobe and Lets His Play Do the Talking
